name: Planet 9
description:
A small experimental game wherein you explore a megastructure in a desolate planet.

Note: This game has no save feature, so finish it in one go. You can skip a stage at any given moment  by pressing CTRL+SHIFT+K. There are a total of 8 logs. 

Enable VSync and cap your fps to avoid screen tearing. 

Credits:

Music by Ross Bugden and ESN Productions
